## Source: ossf-package-analysis (3d1b99b53b31acc086fc6b8dacf38552bb30cc9adba618171a29419f64a43f52)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'rippling-marketing-site' @ 1.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
